subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
United States Open (Tennis)
Australian Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Years of sacrifice and struggle have paid off as Novak Djokovic, now the world’s No. 3 player, leads his nation in its first Davis Cup final, against France.
snippet: Years of sacrifice and struggle have paid off as Novak Djokovic, now the world’s No. 3 player, leads his nation in its first Davis Cup final, against France.
